form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION, Form No. 4-R150,2.

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/31/2023 English) Form Approved. Budget Bureau No. 47-R150.2. DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION RUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. ALL ions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room the form, answer on separate sheets, in duplicate using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. 0 NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa $5.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be ground for your prosecution and/or deportation. I hereby apply for an immigrant visa and alien registration at the United States American Consulate at Belize, British, Honduras and state the following facts: 1. My family name is My first name is My middle name is ROLAND Maria Estela 2. My full name in native alphabet (If other than Ro: an letters are used) is Maria Estela de Roland 3. Other names I have used or by which I have been known are (If married woman, give maiden name) Maria E. Walker 4. The date of my birth is 5. My place of birth is (Day) (Month) (Year) (City or town) (Province) (Country) 15th Aug., 1914 La Ceiba Atlandida, Rep. of Honduras 6. My age is 7. My present calling or occupation is 51 yrs. Domestic 8. My present address is 23 Magazine Road, Belize City, Br. Honduras 9. My sex is 10. My marital status is Female Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated 1 Male Female Including my present marriage, I have been married times. 11. My nationality is Honduranian 12. My personal description is 13. I have the following visible marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height Black 5 feet I inches Scar on right jaw (b) Color of eyes dark Brown (d) Complexion regular 14. My purpose in going to the United States is To reside permanently with my husband 15. I intend to remain in the United States permanently or (Give length of 16. I intend to enter the United States at the port of time) Permanently Los Angeles, California 17. I (Do) (Do Not) have a ticket to my final destination I do not have a ticket 18. (a) I am going to the United States to join the following person (Give name 18. (b) I am sponsored by the following person and/or organization (Give and address and relationship, if any) with my address if different from (a)) By mu husband husband: Albert Alfred ROLAND Albert Alfred ROLAND 1343 E. 41st. P1. Los Angeles, California 19. My final address in the United States is 1343 E. 41st. P1. Los Angeles, California. 20. My personal financial resources are (a) Cash (c) Real estate (value) (b) Bank deposits (d) Other THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
